name: market for transport, passenger aircraft, short haul | transport, passenger aircraft, short haul | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/19452/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'transport, passengers, aircraft, short haul', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is delivering the service of transportation of one passenger across one kilometre (km). This service only considers the transportation of passengers. The vehicle operates with kerosene. Its operation is an average flight of a short-haul passenger aircraft for distance between 800 km and 1500 km, based on Zurich airport, Switzerland.  The aircraft has an operating empty weight (OEW) of 145.0 tons. 

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: H:Transportation and storage/51:Air transport/511:Passenger air transport/5110:Passenger air transport
